participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, Alex approaches challenges head-on despite past hardships.
participant_1.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and ambitious, Sophia takes pride in her daughter's achievements and strives for her own.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. i am now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday.
